known_issues: Admin panel quote form viewer truncates long customer descriptions; full message cannot be seen.

existing_features.title: Update the admin panel Quote Forms table so long customer messages are fully viewable (not truncated). Keep the table compact, but provide an explicit interaction to read the entire message for any ticket (e.g., click the message cell or a "View full" action that opens a dialog/drawer showing the full text with preserved line breaks and scroll when needed).
